title: 12. Our mortgage free story and what debt freedom has done for our family
description:
I hope our debt free/mortgage free story encourages you that financial freedom is possible for you and your family.

Get my free how to start a blog email course HERE. 

Watch the Dave Ramsey Youtube channel HERE.

Follow along with the Farmhouse on Boone blog and Youtube channel HERE and HERE.
